document_data.name: Alphonse Knox
document_data.mainbody: Sergeant '''Alphonse Knox''' was a soldier living in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Knox was considered "one of the good" among the men who served under [[Dagult Neverember]]. He was compassionate and always tried to do what was good, and was motivated by a genuine love of his city.
document_data.Activities: Knox was a sergeant in the [[Neverwinter Guard]], and one of Neverember's personal guards. He was also responsible for dealing with [[adventurer]]s in the city, usually hiring them in defense of Neverwinter against its various enemies.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], Knox was in charge of the defense efforts when [[Valindra Shadowmantle]] put [[the Siege of Neverwinter|Neverwinter under siege]]. Together with the [[cleric]] [[Celeste]], the [[warlock]] [[Makos]], and the [[rogue]] [[Xuna]], Knox led Neverwinter's defenders to victory against the [[undead]] army.
